SELECT jnl14_repr_acnt_cd AS jnl14ReprAcntCd ,( SELECT jnl11_repr_acnt_nm FROM edu.jnl11_repr_acnt WHERE jnl11_repr_acnt_cd = A.jnl14_repr_acnt_cd ) AS jnl14ReprAcntNm , jnl14_list_type AS jnl14ListType , ( SELECT com02_code_nm /** 코드명*/ FROM com02_code WHERE 1=1 AND com02_com_cd = 'ListType' AND com02_dtl_cd = A.jnl14_list_type AND COALESCE(com02_use_yn,'false') = 'true' ) AS jnl14ListTypeNm , jnl14_market_type AS jnl14MarketType , ( SELECT com02_code_nm /** 코드명*/ FROM com02_code WHERE 1=1 AND com02_com_cd = 'MarketType' AND com02_dtl_cd = A.jnl14_market_type AND COALESCE(com02_use_yn,'false') = 'true' ) AS jnl14MarketTypeNm , jnl14_real_acnt_cd AS jnl14RealAcntCd ,( SELECT jnl10_acnt_nm FROM edu.jnl10_acnt WHERE jnl10_acnt_cd = A.jnl14_real_acnt_cd ) AS jnl14RealAcntNm FROM jnl14_real_acnt_map A WHERE 1=1 AND jnl14_repr_acnt_cd = #{jnl14ReprAcntCd} AND jnl14_list_type = #{jnl14ListType} AND jnl14_market_type = #{jnl14MarketType}
